legacy.full_text: #WHO renamed the #coronavirus as #COVID19, to not link it to #Wuhan or #China. Spanish Prof. Mauro Guillen applauds that, recalling how the 1918 "Spanish Flu" harmed his nation's image. "Even 100 years later, we're still fighting that stigma." #InsideTheEpidemic #thepointwithlx https://t.co/G19Xiu3o7N
